Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType>
class stBasicMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >

This abstract class is the basic class for all stBasicXXXXMetricEvaluator classes.

Author:
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino@icmc.usp.br)

Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvieira@icmc.usp.br)

Member Function Documentation

template<class ObjectType>
virtual stDistance stBasicMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >::GetDistance (  ObjectType *  o1,
ObjectType *  o2
)  [pure virtual]
 

This method calculates the metric distance between 2 objects.

Parameters:
obj1 Object 1.
obj2 Object 2.
Returns:
The distance between to objects.
Note:
This method is required to fulfil the stMetricEvaluator interface.

Implemented in stBasicLInfinityMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >, stBasicEuclideanMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >, stBasicManhatanMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >, and stBasicLEditMetricEvaluator< ObjectType, DataType >.

template<class ObjectType>
virtual stDistance stBasicMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >::GetDistance2 (  ObjectType *  o1,
ObjectType *  o2
)  [pure virtual]
 

This method calculates the metric distance between 2 objects raised by the power of 2.

Parameters:
obj1 Object 1.
obj2 Object 2.
Note:
This method is required to fulfil the stMetricEvaluator interface.

Implemented in stBasicLInfinityMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >, stBasicEuclideanMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >, stBasicManhatanMetricEvaluator< ObjectType >, and stBasicLEditMetricEvaluator< ObjectType, DataType >.
